SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package entity

Class Internship

java.lang.Object
entity.Internship
public class Internship extends Object
Represents a specific internship opportunity listed by a company. This entity holds all details regarding the job description, availability dates, vacancy slots, and its current administrative status.

  • Constructor Details

    • Internship

      public Internship(String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, String company, int slots)
      Constructs a new Internship listing. Automatically generates a unique UUID, sets the status to PENDING, and visibility to false (hidden) by default.
      Parameters:
      title - The job title.
      description - The job details/description.
      level - The seniority level (BASIC, INTERMEDIATE, ADVANCED).
      preferredMajor - The major preferred for this role.
      openDate - The date applications open.
      closeDate - The date applications close.
      company - The name of the company offering the internship.
      slots - The total number of positions available.

  • Method Details

      public String getId()
      Gets the unique ID of the internship.
      Returns:
      The UUID string.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks if the internship is currently visible to students.
      Returns:
      true if visible, false otherwise.

      Gets the company name.

      Gets the total number of slots available.

      Gets the number of slots already filled by accepted applicants.
      Returns:
      The filled slots count.

      Updates the seniority level.
      Parameters:

      Updates the preferred major.
      Parameters:
      major - The new major.

    • setOpenDate

      public void setOpenDate(LocalDate openDate)
      Updates the opening date. Validation: The update is ignored if the new date is not before the current closing date.
      Parameters:
      openDate - The new open date.

    • setCloseDate

      public void setCloseDate(LocalDate closeDate)
      Updates the closing date. Validation: The update is ignored if the new date is not after the current open date.
      Parameters:
      closeDate - The new closing date.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(InternshipStatus status)
      Updates the administrative status.
      Parameters:
      status - The new status (e.g., APPROVED, FILLED).

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Updates the visibility of the internship.
      Parameters:
      visible - true to show to students, false to hide.

    • setFilledSlots

      public void setFilledSlots(int filledSlots)
      Updates the number of filled slots.
      Parameters:
      filledSlots - The new count of filled slots.

    • isStudentYearEligible

      public boolean isStudentYearEligible(int year)
      Determines if a student is eligible for this internship based on their year of study. Rule: BASIC level is open to all. INTERMEDIATE/ADVANCED require Year 3 or higher.
      Parameters:
      year - The student's year of study.
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise.

    • updateFrom

      public void updateFrom(Internship other)
      Updates this internship's fields using values from another Internship object. Typically used during an edit operation to bulk-update properties.
      Parameters:
      other - The source Internship object containing updated data.

    • isClosingDatePassed

      public boolean isClosingDatePassed()
      Checks if the application deadline has passed. Compares the closing date to the current system date.
      Returns:
      true if today is strictly after the closing date.

    • incrementFilledSlots

      public void incrementFilledSlots()
      Increments the count of filled slots by one, provided the total slots have not been reached. Used when an application is approved.

    • decrementFilledSlots

      public void decrementFilledSlots()
      Decrements the count of filled slots by one, provided the count is greater than zero. Used when a previously approved application is withdrawn or rejected later.
